item.title: Bellman-Held-Karp Hamiltonian path and Traveling Salesman
item.description: Floyd-Warshall connection This section can be skipped, because it basically my own brain mapping of this problem, since I feel there are some similarities with Floyd-Warshall. For FW, I think of a source and destination pair \(i\) and \(j\) going through some intermediate node \(k\), and relaxing in a reverse triangle inequality kind of way, i.e. \[ d[i][j] = min(d[i][j], d[i][k] + d[k][j]) \] From here it is not immediate obvious how to iterate, i.
